remarks.para: Each in the documentation provides a Key and SubKey, the Key is a unique identifier for a type while the SubKey helps to differentiate between groups of content for that type; such as the List of members.

example.para: So to retrieve the complete list of methods for a types you may do the following.

remarks.para: The SubKey is not required so passing null or an empty string to that parameter will get the type or member which the unique key related to.
